dialogue.speaker: Luke Skywalker
dialogue.text: I've got a bad feeling about this.

dialogue.speaker: Han Solo
dialogue.text: Aww, come on Luke. It's just a little detour to the Death Star.

dialogue.speaker: Luke Skywalker
dialogue.text: I don't know, Han. I've got a feeling we're walking into a trap.

dialogue.speaker: Han Solo
dialogue.text: Aww, don't worry kid. We'll be fine. We've got the Falcon.
